app.connectionLostBody: Please wait until the app reconnects to the server!

register.title: Please choose a username and a password!
register.userEmailAlreadyExists: These username and email already exists.

tableAt.interactiveExhibitMsg: This is an interactive exhibit. Click the button below to start!
tableAt.tableOfflineText: The display is currently not available.
tableAt.tableOccupiedText: Sorry, the display is occupied. Please try again later!
tableAt.beaconPutText: Please, put your phone at the indicated position!
tableAt.beaconOccupiedText: Sorry, but this place is currently occupied by an other player.

quiz.pleaseWait: Please wait until the question is resolved!
quiz.waitNext: Please wait for the next question!

tableOn.connected: Connection to the display successfully established.

interactiveExhibit.interactiveExhibitMsg: This is an interactive exhibit. Click the button below to start!
interactiveExhibit.notAtLocation: Walk to the exhibit to start the interactive content!
interactiveExhibit.quizQuestion: What is the name of the student appearing here?
interactiveExhibit.exhibitNotAvailable: Interactive content is not available yet.

notifiyExhibit.interactiveExhibitMsg: This is an interactive exhibit. Click the button below to start!
notifiyExhibit.tableOfflineText: Sorry, an error occurred. Therefore, the display is currently not available!
notifiyExhibit.tableOccupiedText: Sorry, the display is occupied. Please try again later!
notifiyExhibit.beaconPutText: Please, put your phone at the beacon near the display.
notifiyExhibit.beaconOccupiedText: Sorry, but this place is currently occupied by an other player.

notifiyExhibitOn.connectionMsg: Now use the displays to explore the exhibit.
notifiyExhibitOn.disconnectInfo: Press the button below to close the connection to the exhibit and go back to the previous screen.

coa.title: Coat of Arms of
coa.helpText: Here you can create your personal coat of arms by selecting from the parts below. You can unlock more parts by solving tasks in the exhibition!

changeCredentials.title: Profile Settings
changeCredentials.infoPassword1: Please use at least 6 characters with at least 1 lower case and
changeCredentials.infoPassword2: 1 number or 1 special character! Example: ! $ ยง % & / ( ) = ?
changeCredentials.notSamePassword: The password is not the same.
changeCredentials.credentialsNotChanged: The credentials were not changed correctly.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.text: If you delete your account, you will not be able to reactivate it, and all your data will be lost. Do you really want to proceed?

unlockDialog.title: Unlock Content
unlockDialog.text: Choose 'Unlock' to unlock all exhibits within the app without being there. Thus, you can read the contents. However, you can not connect to interactive exhibits.

alertDialog.title: Exhibit
alertDialog.description: Do you want to go to exhibit:
